data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
In trying to process bounced mail messages in an automated fashion,
    I did not find any suitable code to interpret the message/report
    type as discussed in RFC 1893 and RFC 1894. As I needed the
    functionality, I created Mail::DSN locally and have been using it
    for 8+ months.

    My intent is to bundle it up (once I figure out how) and make it
    available to others for comment, improvement, etc.
